The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is solely related to an unseen creature from thousands and thousands of years ago. Unfortunately for them, this creature wants to eat.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film. In Canada stopping what seems to be an organized criminal outfit might seem simple enough ; but that’s before you throw an army major and his girlfriend into the mix. The Film is directed by Stu Segall at a greatly satisfying pace, keeping the audience engrossed with all of the twists and turns
